info.description: API for a digital library application, providing functionalities for book management, user authentication, and reading features.
info.title: Digital Library API

post.description: Logs in a user with the provided email and password, returning a JWT token.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Registers a new user with the provided email and password.
Adds a new bookmark for a book by the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves all bookmarks for a specific book by the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a bookmark by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all available books.

post.description: Adds a new book to the library. Librarian access required.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific book by its UUID.

put.description: Updates the details of a specific book. Librarian access required.

delete.description: Deletes a book from the library. Librarian access required.

get.description: Retrieves a list of recommended books based on the reading history of users who read the specified book.
Retrieves all collections for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new collection for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves a single collection by its ID.

put.description: Updates a collection's name and/or description.

delete.description: Deletes a collection by its ID.

post.description: Adds a specific book to a specific collection.
post.summary: Add a book to a collection

delete.description: Removes a specific book from a specific collection.
delete.summary: Remove a book from a collection

post.description: Adds a new review for a book by the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves all reviews for a specific book.

put.description: Updates a review written by the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a review by its ID. Can be done by the author or an admin.

get.description: Get a paginated list of users. Admin access required.

post.description: Creates a new user with the admin role. Admin access required.

put.description: Update user details by their ID. Admin access required.

post.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to another user.

delete.description: Unsubscribes the authenticated user from another user.

get.description: Retrieves a user's public profile including follower counts, collections, and reviews.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and a JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
